skills.name: Thorny Onslaught
skills.descriptionreplaced: Deals 4 {SPRITE_PRESET#2101}<color=#99FFFFFF>Cryo DMG</color>. Attaches <color=#FFFFFFFF>Onslaught Stance</color> to this character.
skills.description: Deals 4 Cryo DMG. Attaches Onslaught Stance to this character.

skills.name: Blood-Bonded Shadow
skills.descriptionraw: (Passive) <color=#FFFFFFFF>After this character uses a Skill:</color> Attach <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C122]</color> to the opponent's active character with $[K3] equal to (this Skill's finalized DMG total -2). (Max 5 stacks)
skills.descriptionreplaced: (Passive) <color=#FFFFFFFF>After this character uses a Skill:</color> Attach <color=#FFFFFFFF>Bond of Life</color> to the opponent's active character with <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage(s)</color> equal to (this Skill's finalized DMG total -2). (Max 5 stacks)
skills.description: (Passive) After this character uses a Skill: Attach Bond of Life to the opponent's active character with Usage(s) equal to (this Skill's finalized DMG total -2). (Max 5 stacks)
